data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT HR.EmpCode, dbo.getDateKH(HR.ResigneDate) AS ResigneDateKH,HR.Reason,SP.OthAllName,HR.Department,HR.Section,HP.Description Position,HR.ResigneDate, HD.SecDescription AS KhDept,HP.SecDescription AS KhPost,HS.SecDescription AS KHSECT,SP.Signature,COM.Images, HR.DocumentNo AS RefNo,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), YEAR(HR.CreatedOn)) AS YearResign, dbo.getDateKH(HR.CreatedOn) AS CreatedOn, dbo.getDateKH(GETDATE()) DateNow, (SELECT TOP 1 StampRejectImage FROM SYHRSetting)RejectImage, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode ) As EmpNAME_KH, (SELECT TOP 1 M.AllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode ) As EmpNAME_ENG, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Sex FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode ) As Sex, (SELECT TOP 1 dbo.getDateKH(M.Startdate)FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode ) As Startdate, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EX.Approver) FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel in(@APROLEVEL+1))>0THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)N_A, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END))Status2, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END))Status3,
dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate1, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate2, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate3,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName3,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))sign1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))sign2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))sign3 FROM HREFEmpResign HR LEFT JOIN HRStaffProfile SP ON SP.EmpCode = HR.CreatedBy LEFT JOIN HRDepartment HD ON HD.Code= HR.Department LEFT JOIN HRSection HS ON HS.Code= HR.Section LEFT JOIN HRPosition HP ON HP.Code= HR.Position left join HRCompany COM on SP.CompanyCode=COM.Company WHERE HR.ResignType = 'TERMINAT' AND HR.DocumentNo= @DocumentNo;
